edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework
Class Lida

java.lang.Object
  edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.Lida

public class Lida
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the Model of the framework. All modules, drivers, and other structures that comprise LIDA. To customize modules, this class should be extended and the various init method should be overwritten. TODO: This class must be rewritten to use the classes for modules than can be specified in a file.

Author:
Javier Snaider
